myArrayList.title: Windows 11 For Beginners
myArrayList.author: Samir Imtiaz
myArrayList.heading: Learn Basic UI Navigation, Microsoft Account Creation, Useful Tools, Basic Customization And Windows Security
myArrayList.description:
Like most people, if you use a computer daily but may not feel confident using all its features, I can feel your pain. There is a word called everything has it's first time. I can remember the difficulties I faced when I got my first computer. Unfortunately at that time, there was no course out there to help me. I can feel your pain and I created this course, to help you learn the basics of Windows 11 so that you become comfortable with your computer. Windows 11 is the latest version of the Windows operating system, packed with new features and improvements.


Before I say anything about the course, I want to say something to you.

As an instructor, from my experience, I can tell that this course won't work if you are lazy to learn and don't have any interest in improving your skills. It's a short course, and I'm not teaching you anything crazy. You just have to have the will to learn and ask me questions if you are stuck anywhere. I hope you get my point.


What Will You Learn?

  1. Basic User Interface Navigation.

  2. Microsoft Account Creation

  3. Useful Tools Of Windows 11

  4. Basic Windows 11 Customization

  5. Windows Security


Why Different?


  1. In my previous course on windows 10 basics, I have taught more than 58 thousand students!

  2. This course is made in such a way that it is helpful so that you see these videos on your mobile phone and practice on your computer simultaneously. Thus it will save time, and you will learn more quickly.

  3. There are on-screen notes to make the learning process much easier.

  4. Everyone's course is better, and there is no word called the best, but mine is better than all in terms of learning efficiency and beginners friendly. Please see the free lectures to justify my answer.

  5. Every course must have some flaws; mine have too. The problem is that people don't update their courses based on their students' feedback. I'm glad to announce that this course will be updated with new content regularly.

  6. After completing this course, you will get a certificate that might help you.

  7. I'm confident enough with this course, and you can get 30 days full money-back guarantee, no questions asked. Moreover, you will get lifetime access to the course with future updates and a lifetime opportunity to ask me anything, thus getting a chance to learn from experts.

  8. Just don't be lazy to invest in your education. Get premium support with the best beginner-friendly course. Enroll now.

myArrayList.title: Facebook Marketing & Facebook Ads Course For Beginners 2023

Facebook Advertising & Strategies to Run Facebook Boost Post, Page Likes, Get comments, Messages & traffic to website or generate leads like a pro in just 1 course. 

You will learn from beginner level to advance! We delve deep into EVERY aspect of Facebook and the Facebook Ads Manager settings. Join this course now to learn how to take your brand, product, service, or public figure to the next level with the power of Facebook Marketing!
